numberOfMedicine: Number of pharmaceutical supplies in tons
about_msg: The group was founded in 2011 and its business began to grow rapidly. In 2017, coinciding with the launch of the Saudi Vision 2030 projects, we restructured and developed the group, setting new and innovative strategic and operational plans to adapt to the fundamental changes aimed by the Vision. We adopted the Vision as a guideline in crafting our plans and strengthening our investment expansion. Concurrently with the successive successes of the Vision, and its transformation into a tangible reality that we experience and benefit from day by day, we have been implementing our plans with confident and precise steps.
about_msg_2: In line with the above, the group's focus on investing in the healthcare sector proved successful through the operation of hospitals and specialized medical and social centers. The remarkable success achieved led to expansion into real estate development and contracting, taking advantage of the qualitative leap provided by the Vision since 2017. The group has kept the new national legislations in mind, considering them a key partner in its successes. Building on these achievements, the group continuously plans to compete both locally and globally, having made the ambitious Vision, which reaches for the skies, the limit of its aspirations.
vision_msg: To be an integral part of the Kingdom's developmental future and aspire to lead in global investment and development.
msg_msg: To provide integrated solutions in the fields of development and investment according to the best local and international strategies and methodologies, ensuring they are suitable for the latest economic developments. Our solutions are backed by experience and professionalism, and are characterized by insight and a clear understanding of the current realities.
creative_msg: Innovation and development are the cornerstones of our work.
collaboration_msg: We welcome cooperation and the exchange of expertise.
commitment_msg: We adhere to our contracts, promises, and agreements.
proactivity_msg: We do not hesitate to anticipate and look forward.
address: Prince Abdulmuhsin Bin Jalawi Street - Al Khuzama District, Riyadh 12571, Saudi Arabia
hospitals: Saudi hospitals in the Republic of Yemen
achieve_msg: Based on clear and effective plans.

time: Expected time to join the job
story_title: We help you achieve your dreams.
story_des: Our human achievement is not just words written or in a post printed; here we narrate extraordinary stories of patients who were given a new chance at life. We share with you real experiences of patients who regained their health, and a medical staff who made dreams come true.
